roleset.name: amend text with a partner
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on newswire, comparison to 'edit'. No VNcls.

example.name: both args
example.text: Mr. Kristol , an American Enterprise Institute fellow , co-edits The Public Interest and publishes The National Interest .
